# spx-scrollspy

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                              | Type      | Default                        |
| ------------ | ------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------ |
| `navClass`   | `nav-class`   | Applied class to active navigation element.              | `string`  | `'spx-scrollspy__nav--active'` |
| `rootMargin` | `root-margin` | Intersection observer root margin.                       | `string`  | `'0px'`                        |
| `target`     | `target`      | [prop:target]                                            | `string`  | `'a'`                          |
| `threshold`  | `threshold`   | Intersection observer threshold.                         | `number`  | `0.5`                          |
| `urlChange`  | `url-change`  | Appends the currently active link to the end of the URL. | `boolean` | `false`                        |


## Events

| Event                 | Description    | Type               |
| --------------------- | -------------- | ------------------ |
| `spxScrollspyDidLoad` | [event:loaded] | `CustomEvent<any>` |


## Slots

| Slot             | Description |
| ---------------- | ----------- |
| `"[slot:inner]"` |             |
